website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for its eye-catching modern design. Choose it for aesthetics rather than comfort.
pros: Contemporary design is sleek and attractive
Compact dimensions fit smaller spaces and could even work in an office or entryway, but will seat two in a pinch
Delivers edgy style on a budget

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Choice
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a bright white club chair like this for over 2 years that was priced reasonably. I needed white white (not cream or off white). When the chair arrived, I loved it so much I actually bought another one and the matching loveseat for my bedroom sitting area. I absolutely love them! I am so glad I saw them on Amazon. They are the perfect choice for what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Ppool

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Bought this couch about 2 years ago based on look and size. It's not very comfortable for one, and the back leg now lives inside the couch. This event took place while one person was sitting on it. It was pretty funny. The couch was never overly used or abused in any way. So if you like furniture that reclaims it's own appendages while others rest upon it, this is the couch for you.
customer_reviews.author: Overdrivensloth

customer_reviews.title: So stylish
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome. I was looking for a "chair and a half" so my toddler could sit with me. This is perfect. Very stylish. I've gotten tons of compliments. Would definitely buy again, very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little loveseat ... My home is only 980 sqft cottage like in the hills. UPS delivered to my door 30 mins from town. Happy. I live alone half of the time unless my boys are here. They don't mind the tiny furniture. My 13 yr old is 6ft and he fits fine on it. My brother is 6.4ft and he wouldn't enjoy it for more than an hr. For visiting me once in a while this works. Not much company so for a 5'3 130lb gal it works.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: A perfect addition to my library
customer_reviews.text: This couch took a while to ship but was worth it. A perfect addition to my library. It's light weight which was nice for me because I brought it in and opened the box myself. The legs screw on pretty quickly. Very nice just as pictured. It's a small loveseat but that's what I was looking for. Arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy

customer_reviews.title: I love them and my family does to
customer_reviews.text: I love it it's small but that's what I wanted my living room is super small and these couches fit pertctly
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Just pray you get the right item.  The exchange process is dreadful with LexMod.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered (2) white and (1) black (1) white came. Boxes were torn, guessing the warehouse workers don't care about proper order fufillment. The exchange process with Lex Mod has been horrific. They never pick up phone calls or return messages or never give detailed feedback on ETA. Spent hrs trying to get proper information on exchange status.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the quality and comfort for the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these loveseats for a customer waiting area in our shop. I am very pleased with the quality and comfort for the money.
customer_reviews.author: kristin noyes

customer_reviews.title: Super adorable
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered this loveseat on a Sunday and received it on Wednesday as promised. I had to do some measuring prior to ordering for my small studio. This loveseat is super adorable,comfy,very true to size, can easily sit two and matches my decor flawlessly. I would recommend this to anyone with a small space. Just be aware the package is huge. Only took me about 6 minutes to screw the legs in and I was all set
customer_reviews.author: jayda

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest settee and fits perfectly into the tiny space that I needed it for. It comes fully assembled and I only had to screw on the legs. It is pretty light weight and would probably slide all over a floor that doesn't have carpet. I plan to have it up against the wall and place an area rug underneath it as well. I'm so pleased with this purchase so I hope that it holds up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Eyes Wide

customer_reviews.title: So cute for my salon waiting area
customer_reviews.text: What a great deal and so cute. It is light and can be pushed easily, so only complaint is keeping it where you want it to stay. Bought it for my guests at my salon and I get tons of compliments on it. It was easy to put together and comfy to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: yanna

customer_reviews.title: Leg support failed
customer_reviews.text: The support for one of the legs gave out. Now there are only 3 legs to support the sofa. No good. Not something easily fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Diavatis

customer_reviews.title: the couch itself is fantastic. For the price I paid I wasn't sure ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipping: When this item arrived I was shocked at how absolutely destroyed the box was. Then I opened the box and there was a half empty bottle of kiwi-strawberry Snapple laying on the couch. I have no idea how it survived the shipping experience! However, the couch itself is fantastic. For the price I paid I wasn't sure if it would be a flimsy piece of furniture. It is rock solid in a good way, which is why it made it through the shipping. The cushion is also very soft and has Velcro so it doesn't slide off when you sit on it. Extremely happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MauriceK

customer_reviews.title: Surpasses my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This little loveseat surpasses my expectations! I thought it would be firm, but the cushion is soft and quite comfortable. I thought the white would be stark/pure white, but it’s creamy. The fabric feels like kid leather. My only complaint is that there wasn’t enough packing material in the shipping box and whatever was stacked with it crushed the box and embossed into the side of the couch and hasn’t unembossed after a week of being unpacked. Luckily, that side is not visible where I have it placed. Incidentally, I ordered the matching cube footstools, and they go perfectly with it.
customer_reviews.author: Flynn Household

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price! Looks sharp
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's an excellent piece of furniture and looks really sharp. We had a cigar tent at our wedding and were looking into renting furniture. They want a stupid amount of money for that so I decided to go on Amazon and get some sharp looking pieces that weren't hatefully expensive. I bought 2 of these and they were perfect, people really loved it and it fit the decor beautifully! They're in our rec room now and look good. Of course you get what you pay for but when the price drops on these they're excellent for the price (watch the price, it fluctuates)
customer_reviews.author: Angela_GTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: It was very comfortable to sit in and looks elegant but the legs ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for an office waiting area but as soon as we affixed the legs and sat in it it was wobbly. We thought that it could be due to the floor so we moved it to another room and it was the same issue. It was very comfortable to sit in and looks elegant but the legs were defective and seemed not able to handle heavy weight.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: cute... mainly for looks or maybe a seat to put your shoes on in the am... wouldn't replace your couch
customer_reviews.text: cute but small.... can fit my man and i sitting but not laying or slouching. made for 1 person and some pillows realistically but works in our tiny office. i like the color for our decor but it does get supper clammy on the hot days. **IF YOU RE GETTING THIS FOR KIDS PLEASE BE ADVISED I DON'T THINK THIS WHITE SHINY FABRIC WILL HOLD UP TO MUCH ABUSE/"WEAR AND TEAR" but its fine for adults/normal use
customer_reviews.author: J. Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Not what is pictured, received a different couch
customer_reviews.text: It arrived minus the legs plus it does not match the picture. Smooth back instead of the button one pictured. Very poorly packed, the box had disintegrated
customer_reviews.author: Jerry A. Shults

customer_reviews.title: Pleather
customer_reviews.text: This settee came in a huge box. It arrived in perfect condition, and the legs were simply hand screw on; can't get any easier. The pictures show this item to have a fair bit of shine, which it does not in person. It is very close to a matte. It's obviously pleather, but we still like it. The size is exactly as state, and we love that the cushion can come off for cleaning. It also unzips if you need to add padding later. The seat cushion is one solid piece of foam.
customer_reviews.author: Boyzoo

customer_reviews.title: Great little loveseat!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. We just wanted something to accent and knew when we bought this that it didn’t look super comfortable. It’s just enough for extra seating and to access the room. It’s perfectly comfortable when sitting up, but it’s definitely not a lounger. Very lightweight, but plenty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: Pure comfort in a small package!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this piece of furniture! The arms are just the right height to hold your arm naturally and the curved back lets you just snuggle in. Since It just has the four squat legs at the corners to hold it up, I don't flop into it, but it is becoming my favorite place to read. I bought a round footstool to go with it that matches perfectly, so call me comfy! 😊
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Payne

customer_reviews.title: This is the most perfect chair! It is very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small bedroom and I am a " fluffy" girl, but wanted a little reading nook in my bedroom. This is the most perfect chair! It is very comfy. I paired it with a matching stool I found at another stool and it is just what I wanted in my nook.
customer_reviews.author: 1mommyteacher

customer_reviews.title: Nice small couch
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was a bit flimsy. It came in a thin cardboard box that was starting to come apart, but the couch was also wrapped in plastic. Even with the flimsy packaging, the couch was in perfect condition and looked just as it is pictured. It is pretty light and the only assembly was screwing in the legs, which took all of 3 minutes. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hawley

customer_reviews.title: that's fine. I wanted an inexpensive but nice-looking chair for ...
customer_reviews.text: Let's be clear: No one is going to see this and mistake it for leather. For me, that's fine. I wanted an inexpensive but nice-looking chair for my bedroom, so I had somewhere to read. This fit the bill perfectly. The size is perfect (not too big or too small), and it's pretty lightweight, so I can shift it around if I need to and not scuff up the floor.
customer_reviews.author: csev

customer_reviews.title: Looks more expensive great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I have had many compliments of the unique style and its easy to clean and put together.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome little loveseat
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little loveseat. Looks just as good in person! Very light, fast shipping. Bought two for my 475 square foot appartment. Would recommend to anyone with a small appartment.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bump

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: For the money it looks great. I have it in a foyer, so it doesn’t get much sitting, which is good because I wasn’t buying it for a comfort factor. - i had a slight concern about the sturdiness of the legs, but so far so good. Very easy to assemble! For the money looks awesome - perfect cognac color
customer_reviews.author: J north east

customer_reviews.title: Handsome Chair
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. It is everything I expected. The removable seat is comfortable. I like the fact that assembly requires no tools at all. Screws on the legs are already in place which makes it super easy to attach to the chair using your hands. Once the legs are attached, the chair can slide on hard floor, making it easy to move from one place to another. You might struggle to get this item through your door. It is quite wide. Be sure to make proper door measurements. Take in consideration the dimensions of the chair. Prepare accordingly and things will fall into place.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for in our lounge room! Great quality can't wait to buy another to replace our ikea chair!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this piece. Ordered it for my office to replace a string of chairs for clients. It is small, elegant, and professional looking. Lightweight and easy to move around but so far has been durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Better than leather
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, feels and looks like leather, but much easier to take care of. It is well made, comes packaged perfectly, and most of all, it's comfortable for one or two. Have received many compliments and fits in those tight little places where you need a seat or two.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Fillingim, JD

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat uncomfortable, but looks great!
customer_reviews.text: ***Shipping for this item was a nightmare, it took weeks instead of days*** That being said, this sits in my home office and is very attractive. The material has held up okay so far, even with my Labrador jumping all over it. It's not very comfortable to sit on for any length of time, but overall I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Worst company I’ve ever dealt with!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase from Modway!!! They are horrible and will make you pay for the return on all your items which almost cost as much as you bought them for!!!! Horrible customer service!!! Very unhappy customer!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: TLM

customer_reviews.title: Cute little, simple ,lightweight chair
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn’t like the chair. Thought it was too small and flimsy bc it’s light weight. Was going to return it But my husband loves it so I’m keeping it. I just don’t like the way it moves around bc it’s lightweight but generally it’s cute. Not sure how long the faux leather would keep up that’s why I’m giving 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: heavychic

customer_reviews.title: just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Great chair. I ordered 2 to go in my bedroom which has a black/white/teal color scheme. They fit in perfectly. The feet are a very dark brown but you don't even notice it. Good quality, sturdy, and not too heavy for an average female to carry up the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: ElleBee

customer_reviews.title: Love these Chairs
customer_reviews.text: Great Chairs. They are smaller than they look, short and compact, which is perfect because I needed them to go in the master bedroom and didn't want something overwhelming. Nicely made and they look great.....easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great little seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this little couch. It's perfect for the spot I needed it for. I was a little nervous that the seat would get scratched up by my dogs since it's right in front of their lookout window but do far no scratches. Beautiful piece of furniture
customer_reviews.author: Lucie W

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I've made
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I've made! I have a 50 lb dog who jumps up to play and has not cut the material or left any marks. Fantastically durable. It looks great and is comfortable, too. I highly recommend this to anyone who has a dog who may scratch things up. Perfect for my small apartment, easy to put the legs on, and excellent look. The only thing I can think might be better is having one large cushion instead of two inside the seat cushion cover. The break between the two cushions does stand out after a few days of use. Still, excellent price for an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly very comfortable. I bought it as short term furniture until I can save up some money to buy some nice livingroom furniture but I really enjoy relaxing in this piece. Just add a throw pillow and u can lay on it and curl up for hours comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great piece for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and in perfect condition. While this isn't what I would call fine furniture it is a nice piece for my purposes. It's light weight so I have it against a wall. Not sure how it would perform if it were floating in a room with small children involved since the leg placement might make it possibly tip backwards if hit with running force.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The perfect little loveseat for my in-home photo studio! I love that I can pair it with modern OR vintage styled furniture. The button detailing on the couch is very pretty. It feels durable when though it's light in weight.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love this piece
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Love this piece. Comfortable, Modern, perfect size for our family room "nook," and the color and design are true to this picture. Looks Fabulous and several visitors have commented on how much they like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a little sitting area in my kitchen. So far so good. Really assembly, sort leather, comfy. It seems pretty sturdy. So far I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cwhite

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Overall, very pleased. It's a little lower than expected once seated, but it is comfortable and cute. Perfect for my 5'2" height. Very light and easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi S. Reicher

customer_reviews.title: ... so light I could not believe it was my love seat when it arrived
customer_reviews.text: This was so light I could not believe it was my love seat when it arrived. I thought omg this is prob such a cheap product, but I took it out and put it in my salon and it is so beautiful, sturdy and perfect!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Huber

customer_reviews.title: I love this love seat
customer_reviews.text: I love this love seat. So stylish and modern and soft leather like however it's much smaller than what it looks. It works fine for where I have it but didn't expect it to be that small. It's a good love seat for the price though. I bought the matching chairs also and those are perfect. Wish they would have this as a sofa
customer_reviews.author: Henrida01

customer_reviews.title: TIME WILL TELL
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PURCHASE BUT THE SMELL OF SMOKE / CIGARETTES IS HORRIBLE~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ I PRAY IT GOES AWAY OR ELSE I WILL RETURN
customer_reviews.author: Mary Delafuente

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: In one of the reviews it was mentioned that this was shiny. It isn’t. It does look nice though. It’s perfect for a conversation area away from the media in our great room. Wish it was shiny though.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Weller

customer_reviews.title: My partner and I fit comfortably, with space to spare
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the loveseat and the chair, and both pieces exceeded my expectations! My partner and I fit comfortably, with space to spare, on the loveseat, and the chair is perfect to cozy up in with a good book. The material is super easy to clean and actually quite comfortable! Not necessarily "lay down for a nap" furniture, but great for casual movie nights and general lounging. Beautiful aesthetic, too. Suits our cozy, jewel-toned living room perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany0Kay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair, high quality
customer_reviews.text: The love-seat became the favorite chair for my family who loves hard cushion. My little boy likes to lay down on the chair for nap. It worths every penny and looks gorgeous, so I will buy the small one as well.
customer_reviews.author: TimEllie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Thid chair is awesome and comfy. Its very deep and wide. I ordered another one. What a great deal
customer_reviews.author: smart shopper

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and it comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Given the price it is a decent piece of furniture. It is not going to last many years of our use with three dogs hopping on it too. That's ok given the price. Looks nice and it comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby's Mom

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this little sofa!
customer_reviews.text: This sofa is perfect for the sitting area in our Master Suite. It went together easily, looks great, and hubby and I love sitting on it together. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie D.

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN LEATHER-LUXURY ON A BUDGET!
customer_reviews.text: I searched high and low for a comfortable, supportive, executive-type chair for a 10x10 space... All were either too big, to low or just looked cheesy. This is AMAZING; better than leather. It has a detachable puffy cushion, perfect height for knee issues and arms/back literally feel like they are hugging you!! Everyone LOVES it, it is most luxurious for the price; highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M Lucena LMP

customer_reviews.title: Glad I chose this for my small condo- it looks ...
customer_reviews.text: Glad I chose this for my small condo- it looks nice and was very quick and easy to put together, took 5 minutes, just screwing the legs in- you don't even need a screwdriver. It's sturdy and fits me and my 60 pound dog or me and my toddler. I got it because my husband hogs the couch, so I wanted a place for myself, and it's perfect. It will be no problem to move someday since it's so light.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this great looking and comfortable loveseat.....I switched the 5" legs out for 8' legs to give it more
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Good price and easy to clean. Bought the chair too. They look nice and are practical too.
customer_reviews.text: Used as a dog couch, we have 3 dogs who sit in the front room waiting for us to come home from work. They love to stare out the window.
customer_reviews.author: Unaveragebuyer

customer_reviews.title: Love this loveseat
customer_reviews.text: Cute little piece! Perfect size for my piece of accent furniture. Just be sure to read the measurements before ordering. I love it though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice loveseat. Smaller size is perfect as is the leather-like covering. Good value for the price
customer_reviews.author: Barbo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my photography studio
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my photography studio. The legs were pretty scuffed up, but that's not a big deal for me, I used a sharpie to touch them up. Feels like a solid piece and looks better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Christa W.

customer_reviews.title: Yolanda
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time, it was white, it was easy to assemble but its small
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Great chair. Shippingtook weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair. Was looking for a simple white accent chair of this type of modern and mid 19th Century design. This chair looks wonderful in my new living room and house. The chair is lightweight but sturdy enough. Only thing was shipping took 3x's longer than both my 120 pound each, platform beds under Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: quikz

customer_reviews.title: comfort and convenience
customer_reviews.text: beautiful furniture. fits so well with my redone room. everyone loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey J. Dinkins

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I was a little worried when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I was a little worried when I read some negative reviews. But no problem at all. Super easy to put together. Just put on the 4 legs and no screws needed. Looks so elegant too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Sexiest Chair I've Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this chair because it matches my bed frame. It is sturdy, has a large seat, and looks very smexeh. It's perfect for my room and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Crane6

customer_reviews.title: Best part of my new office
customer_reviews.text: Best part of my new office! I love this love seat. It was very easy to put together and it is exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mustang Sally

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Perfect size for an average size person like me. Looks great as an accent chair. Light wieght & easy assembly
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: review of chairs
customer_reviews.text: very satisfied with the chairs. I use them in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Lucille Moody

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a small loveseat. It sits low and has a low profile but it works great in my room. Very stylish and as you use it , it softens up . Perfect for my area.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Birmingham

customer_reviews.title: great buy!
customer_reviews.text: perfect, small loveseat for our enclosed, beach house front porch! porch is small and this just fits!!! simple to assemble; screw on the legs! easy to care for! looks as good in person as it does online! would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Dotymama

customer_reviews.title: This is a great as an odd chair I love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great as an odd chair I love it. Going to get the ottoman to go with it. Will buy another for the bedroom. I give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: semi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I am blown away of how beautiful this love sofa is! I had my doubts , and I am using it for my new salon but placed it at my home and loved it to order a second one for our living room! So elegant and modern! Def recomend!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Cute little love seat
customer_reviews.text: This cute little love seat looks exactly like the picture. It doesn't look cheap @ all. I really love the feel of it...
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair it’s so cute an elegant good quality
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Missing leg screw. It is very hard to get replacement from manufacture distributor
customer_reviews.author: hong xiao

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey.... but cute and comfy for small spaces so far so good.had it only for a couple of month with little use.
customer_reviews.author: Menchu

customer_reviews.title: like it was for a childs
customer_reviews.text: Furniture was small. like it was for a childs room
customer_reviews.author: ccy

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these chairs and just love them! They added a pop of brightness against gray walls and dark flooring--just what the living area was missing.
customer_reviews.author: JessaRusso

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect little seat for our reading room and all I had to do was screw in the legs :)
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: but very small and super light. I can pick it up by myself ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but very small and super light. I can pick it up by myself without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The faux leather looks very cheap. The couch is stiff and not well-padded. The couch also is super low to the ground so not a good fit for many adults. One person would fit on it.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice for sitting. Not comfortable for slouching. But i like it.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely44

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a Great Buy...
customer_reviews.text: What a perfect little chair for the price. Looks a lot more expensive. Ordered it for my bedroom and it looks wonderful. Very well made and comfortable. It goes perfect with modern decor.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this love seat but it did not come with ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this love seat but it did not come with the legs and I had to order additional ones.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Too small. This is perfect for a kids room or party.
customer_reviews.author: DeNeia and Kevin

customer_reviews.title: These chairs are nice but it came with a few creases on the ...
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are nice but it came with a few creases on the left side. Did not want to go through hassle of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Saca

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for my studio apartment but I love how it ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for my studio apartment but I love how it pretty nice looking and I can wipe up after my toddler. It was a bit wobbly but that was my fault didt screw in on e leg all the way
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The small sofa accommodated my room I'm enjoying it immensely Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing...!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! It’s the perfect piece to complete my living room, great quality and comfort...
customer_reviews.author: jdj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my couch, was a perfect fit for my small office space. Item came just as described. I would recommend and repurchase from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THREE LEGGED CHAIR
customer_reviews.text: The chair was nice until I discovered that one of the legs didn't have a nut to screw into the base of chair. What am I going to do with a 3 legged chair? I had to go to the hardware store buy a nut, some tacks, remove the fabric at the bottom and repair this chair myself. Not happy about that. Plus there was no number for me to contact company. I could only contact them through Amazon. Will not purchase from this company again. I gave it 2 stars only because the chair was cute but defective.
customer_reviews.author: EKlin702

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Good solid chair for the price. Installing the legs was easy, and I think they're going to stay without constant adjustment. Wide enough for a plus size person, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Brack

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: It's a home run. Great value. Don't know what the nay sayers are -itching about. I love it! Would buy it again. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Francis M. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great 2 seater loveseat
customer_reviews.text: I love this little 2 seater. It is comfortable enough and can sit higher off the ground or lower without the legs. My only problem is that it slides on my wood floor. Also I saw it online in other places for less than it was here.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!! I finally have a cute seat for my salon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Mebus

customer_reviews.title: Great small sofa!
customer_reviews.text: This is totally adorable! It is a cute little sofa-maybe not the softest in the world,but really nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This item is very much smaller than I expected.. the cushion is very thin .. sat in it once and now it has a dent .. I weigh 150 lbs .. not worth the price at all
customer_reviews.author: Salon owner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, do not be scared to buy!! Bought for my father, want one for myself now!
customer_reviews.author: jj's ops

customer_reviews.title: Great Office Couch
customer_reviews.text: Seller comes highly recommended. Fast shipping. Love the couch. It looks great in my office. Easy to assemble legs and comfortable. Shug
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina L. WEST

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these...put them in my office with a matching table. Nice bright true white and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

product_meta.title: Modway Prospect Upholstered Contemporary Modern Loveseat In Black Faux Leather
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Size:LoveseatIntrinsically luxurious, Prospect is a throwback to the classic Chesterfield design, while delivering an engaging modern look filled with passion and drive. Button tufting and sweeping curves blend to form a contemporary lounge piece that all will be drawn to. This cozy loveseat with espresso stained wood legs and non-marking foot caps features comfortable foam padding and smooth faux leather upholstery.
feature_bullets: CONTEMPORARY STYLE - Boasting a tailored profile and chic style, Prospect embodies luxurious intrigue and sophistication. Prospect reinvents the iconic chesterfield style with contemporary allure
FINE UPHOLSTERY - Upholstered in smooth faux leather, Prospect's inset buttons create an elegant diamond-tufted design. Energizing your décor, this collection is ideal for small spaces or loft living
MODERN LOUNGE SPOT - A cherished round back upholstered loveseat for any modern lounge space, Prospect provides a comfortable place to rest while relaxing or reading a bedtime story in the kid’s room
SUPERIOR CONSTRUCTION - Expertly crafted, Prospect sits atop sturdy wood legs with non-marking caps. Sweeping curves and structured detail make Prospect a worthy focal point in the modern home
TUFTED LOVESEAT MEASUREMENTS - Redefining any living space, Prospect makes a striking statement brimming with possibility. Product Dimensions: 28.5"L x 49"W x 29.5"H; Maximum Weight Capacity: 285 lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars270 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: One year warranty against manufacturer defects.
